website_summaries.verdict: A grippy steering wheel spinner that emphasizes comfort and usability.
pros: The large surface area of the knob is covered with a comfortable and grippy silicon rubber material
The mounting ring is protected to reduce tears and scratches on the steering wheel
cons: The fit is on the smaller side for   large steering wheels often found in trucks and SUVs

customer_reviews.title: This trucker Approves!!!
customer_reviews.text: First off I came here looking for a knob for my Ken worth, and the reviews left me confused If this would work... The answer is yes!! It comes with 2 inserts to make it fit on your wheel tighter. I installed it without the insert the first time, but if I put weight on it, it would turn.. so installed again and it is perfectly tight with 1 insert! pros: sturdy nice bearings make turning easy looks cool cons: none
customer_reviews.author: nightwolf24m

customer_reviews.title: Like it and it was worth the buy for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Like it and it was worth the buy for my dodge diesel truck. I had it mounted outside of the wheel at first but isn't very practical. Now it's inside and seems to work much better. Also I needed to add a little rubber filler piece to make it bolt down snug. I cut a piece of an old washing machine hose, split it down one side and it worked perfectly. Rock solid.
customer_reviews.author: George Karakats

customer_reviews.title: NON REFUNDABLE JUNK DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Didnt fit on the intended vehicle and we attempted to return it only to find out it cannot be for ANY REASON. Put it on my wifes car and it LITERALLY FELL APART on the first day. Yup that picture is about 20 miles of use, the rubber looking soft item in the picture seems like it was made out of a melted eraser. Pieces of it shreaded all over the seat and now the coating is gone. COMPLETE JUNK AND YOU CANNOT RETURN IT!!
customer_reviews.author: CustomerOne

customer_reviews.title: Becomes wobbly, impossible to install
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought 2 of these devices, chugging the first one to a fluke, but within 4 days both became very loose, not to the steering wheel (that was excruciatingly painful as it almost did not close to have enough circumference to wrap around the wheel) but within the knob itself. You open the package, it's beautiful and tight. But as it is used, it begins to wobble within itself (still very tight to the wheel). The wobbling got me too nervous to keep the device installed; thus looking for another elegant non-flashy one... Sorry, cannot recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Josen

customer_reviews.title: Awsome device make my life esier
customer_reviews.text: Best things I've bought in a long time. I drive all day and make a lot of 3 point and u turns. this devise makes my job and life so much easier. i recommend using at low speed and make sure it fits right before driving because it is easy for your hands to slip off knob while turning. nothing to do with the devise user error also updated to a 3 stars. 1 because the coating on the entire device is peeling off in my hands and has peeled significantly more since I took that picture. 2 Because customer service wont even dignify me with a response to there direct email
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A.

customer_reviews.title: Good product with one minor flaw
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well designed Steering knob- not the most comfortable but has a very smooth rotation. The face is rubber and the rest of it is shiny black plastic with a rubber coating. I know what is underneath that coating because after a couple of weeks it started to come off in patches. After so long I just finished pulling off the shredding coating and the know looks and feels pretty good without that stuff on the plastic. The knob works great and I wish they hadn't put that rubber coating on it to begine with, but I am happier without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't imagine doing without!!
customer_reviews.text: Since I was a teenaer, Ihave wanted one of these. I knew them as "suicede knobs"..... still not sure why. These give such incredible control of the wheel and manuverability is outstanding!! for work , I tow a trailer and must frequently backup- this really helps ALOT!. Now the negatives- the knob relies on a "friction clamping Pressure" to prevent loose rotation on the steering wheel. It is inadequate for the safety necessary- you will end up fighting this loosey goosey knob mount until you find something else that works. Personally, I drilled a hole in the steering wheel and knob mounting base and "popped in a rivet" This gave a secure connection.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D King

customer_reviews.title: Amazed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome. Whisper quiet operation. Easy to install. Premium look. Costs more than competitor's but totally worth the extra cost. More than satisfied, one of the most memorable purchases made on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Singh

customer_reviews.title: Highly functional
customer_reviews.text: I work for the post office and deliver out of my personal vehicle which is a left hand drive vehicle, so I steer with my left hand and use the pedals with my left foot while sitting in the middle. My shoulder was giving pain before I started using this knob, it makes steering easier and honestly a little safer because I can constantly keep my grip on the knob, unlike before. Looks nice, grip is comfortable, only minor complaint is the screw has a large area, meaning you will need a fat Phillips screwdriver or even use a flathead.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques Edel

customer_reviews.title: Works great and has survived a summer in the desert.
customer_reviews.text: I busted a shoulder so turning my steering wheel sucked. Wanted something low profile so I didn't have a big knob sticking up from my steering wheel and figured I'd try this one. It comes with 2 rubber pads that form to your wheel, and I cut one to fit the thickness of my steering wheel and then tightened the thing down. If you have a skinny steering wheel, just cut the rubber pad to size. Took me less than 15 minutes to install the knob. Hasn't come loose and I've had it on a few months now. It's survived a 110 degree summer just fine. Added bonus: I've also discovered that my car has an amazing turning radius.
customer_reviews.author: MarioBowser

customer_reviews.title: Great Functionality & Quality beyond the low price. Or pay $800. for the one Insurance Wont cover.
customer_reviews.text: All interested. After receipt & install, and seeing Complaints in Reviews thought, "Send back if it's that bad." I am 5 months and some 5000 miles of driving, it is Not; Loosening, slipping, sliding, falling off spindle or any degradation except a "wear spot" on rubber trim. A great Product & Value. As an amputee w/many "adapted accessories" I know that some items last long, some short. I was trained by my PT to get my license endorsed by DMV. this will Undoubtedly last.Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my car, because I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my car, because I had my right shoulder replaced, and can not lift that arm as high as my left. It has been a tremendous help to me in making turns.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia West

customer_reviews.title: Not bad . . . but
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. It fit my Ford F150 just right. Really smooth rotation of the spinner. Wished I could have gotten a different color but nevertheless it's a pretty good product. Only complaint I have is that the rubber coating on the body of the spinner is beginning to flake off in pretty short order. Not a huge big deal but it's shedding everywhere now. The plastic underneath, thankfully, is glossy black so it doesn't stick out like a sore thumb. All in all, if you can live with rubber shedding off, it looks and works pretty well otherwise. Really helps turn the steering easily.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works great for my snow drifting. I give it five stars even though it has one issue. The locking mechanism uses a Phillips head screw and will not take a full tighten needed to keep this thing locked down. I replaced the Phillip head screw with a button cap hex screw and tightened to about 60 N-M and it does not move. FYI to company selling this thing, a Phillips head was invented to solve the over-torquing in assembly so think about changing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: because I liked the grippiness of the silicone
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit steering wheels that have a flattened shape where you grip, even with the included pads. I made it work with some Dycem sheet, because I liked the grippiness of the silicone. Turns out it’s NOT silicone at all, it’s just a matte coating on the ball and it’s started to wear off within 2 months of use. It’s pretty shiny underneath, definitely not grippy where it’s peeled off. I almost didn’t order due to the sexist commentary in the description but it was the closest to what I needed under $100.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Great for lawn mower after slight modification
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a lawn mower - and makes tight turns a breeze. Installation instructions are a bit lacking, and even with silicone/rubber sleeve, the unit has a little play/slip over time when first installed. I put some electrical tape to tighten up the gap, and now works great. I recommend installing so handle is on the outside of steering wheel to increase leverage I wouldn't recommend for car installation, no way I would trust this device at high speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Z

customer_reviews.title: Very well built and smooth operating.
customer_reviews.text: The Power handle is very well built and easy to install. I have temporarily installed it on a BMW X3 at the 2 O'clock position while my left arm recovers from an injury. I come with two different thicknesses of rubber spacers to ensure a tight fit and to protect the steering wheel. The Power handle looks great and is very smooth operating. Backing into a parking spot and making tight turns were wicked easy. I will be putting it on my JD compact tractor when I am healed or maybe I will just purchase another one :))
customer_reviews.author: TimGS

customer_reviews.title: Makes driving easier
customer_reviews.text: Smooth operation. Much easier to turn than a no frills model I previously had. I got a spinner years ago when I had a shoulder injury. It really helped make driving easier. I liked it so much, I kept it even after my shoulder healed. I got a new car and forgot to remove my spinner from my old car. Decided to upgrade. The silicone feels more comfortable than the hard plastic and this one spins nicely. Installation was easy. Directions are written in Chinese or Japanese, but, the picture tells you all you need to know. I used an impact drill to tighten the screw. Might be harder with a screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I got it after shoulder replacement surgery and I've been able Drive much more comfortably with the knob then without. Was s life saver in that I didn't need a driver after my initial recovery. Only bad thing is the out rubber or plastic coating around edges of knob rubbed off easily but it didn't cause a functional issue, just cosmetic.
customer_reviews.author: Kin_finder

customer_reviews.title: after an operation on my daughters hand she could no ...
customer_reviews.text: after an operation on my daughters hand she could no longer drive her suv , after installing installing the power handle she had know problem coming the 100 mi to home
customer_reviews.author: stephen gibbons

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I'm a regional trucker and know that I'm not supposed to have this in my truck but I like them. This product works well for me. I have the handle on the inside of the steering wheel otherwise it hits my tummy....lol. I'm not sure how the quality is on this. It seems like it could break easily but I won't know since I switched jobs and accidently left it in the other truck. I will buy again tho and see if this thing holds together well and then update here.
customer_reviews.author: Southbaydude

customer_reviews.title: Great for someone with hand/wrist problems!
customer_reviews.text: After having surgery on my right arm and wrist last year, I ordered this steering wheel knob to help me turn easier and safer while I needed to drive one handed. After my second surgery on my left arm/wrist, I simply moved the knob to the other side of the steering wheel so I could use it with the other hand. I am now fully recovered from both of those surgeries, however, I still have some pain in my wrists and arms. I am continuing to use the knob because it still makes turning easier for me. The knob has been secure and I've had no problems with it slipping at all.
customer_reviews.author: B.McQueen

customer_reviews.title: the neatest invention since peanut butter!
customer_reviews.text: When I sprained my wrist, driving became really difficult. This little wheel is so comfortable and aestetically pleasing it's on the car all the time now. Even for geriatrics it made turning the wheel for parking, sharp turns etc much easier on people with weak muscles , shoulder/arm injuries and wrist injuries. Hell keep it on the wheel for the fun of it. A silicone feel so you've got good grip and no sweaty hands. A really handy item !
customer_reviews.author: winterwhisper569

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for paraplegics!
customer_reviews.text: My uncle is a paraplegic and decided to purchase this so one handed driving is easier for him. He has to keep one hand on the sticks attached to the pedals at all times, so having a hand free to turn is necessary. It was doable without this product, but made things much easier and safer for him to be able to do one handed turns with the product. It was easy to install, great grip and ergonomics, and looks pretty pleasing to the eye.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, good grip 'washer' inside makes for a tight connection with no wobbles on steering wheel while grippy surface on the knob itself makes it feel good to use. hand doesn't slip while turning. for anyone with rotator cuff injuries this is a must have if you need to drive through the healing process. i was telling my mom about looking for one online and she exclaimed "oh, you mean a 'necker's knob'?" #borninthe50's
customer_reviews.author: amazonamy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It's really smooth, feels great and solid quality. 4 stars instead of 5 because instillation is really hard and after a while it starts loosening on the wheel. Comes with 2 leather strap used as a shimmy to give it a firmer grip. I'm a trucker so my steering wheel is thicker than a 4 wheelers. Suicide knobs are a must have and if you're a trucker, this is a good option. Doing my hard maneuvers while backing have become lazy since this makes steering super easy. Can't back without one now
customer_reviews.author: KR4Q

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT STEERING WHEELS COMES LOOSE
customer_reviews.text: Installation is highly dependent on the type of steering wheel you have. I don’t recommend this because we own a 2019 Acura MDX with a nice thick leather wrapped steering wheel. The problem with this item is it doesn’t stay on properly and the shape of it doesn’t make installation easy. If it fit properly I’m sure it would stay on but after a while it comes loose. Worse.... I tried to return it within 30 days and amazon says it doesn’t qualify for a return. Referred me to the suppliers website. Suppliers website says it follows Amazons return policy. Edit: Amazon customer service provided a refund
customer_reviews.author: T. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this suicide knob came with different size mounting options for different thicknesses of steering wheels. I use this knob on my lawn tractor which has a thick steering wheel, and it fit perfectly. The silicon knob itself has a great feel to it, especially with no gloves on. Now I can keep one hand on the wheel and one hand on the hydrostatic speed control and fly around the yard like I'm in an Indy car.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Installation is a breeze and you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after I broke my left elbow. A person still has to drive. This little gadget gave me my freedom back and safety on the road. I still have it on my car, because I am still recovering from my injury, and it allows me easier wheel turning with minimal effort. If you have limited hand function or simply need a little help, get one today.
customer_reviews.author: inrevisionfromyesterday

customer_reviews.title: Fit is good, finish not so much...
customer_reviews.text: The mounting and stability of the knob is good. Fairly easy to put on, although the locating tab to put the halves together is a little fiddly when fitting it around the steering wheel. Bearings seem like they will last without issue. Unfortunately, the finish on the knob itself lasted all of 2 weeks, and only about 5 drives. The nice looking matte black rubber covering flaked off in my hand during a short 5 minute drive. Being that I really wanted that nice matte finish, knocked down to 2 stars. Otherwise it's a solid 4-5 star piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jhigs

customer_reviews.title: Instructions not in English
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok spinner knob. I found it difficult to install correctly because the packaging and instructions are entirely in Mandarin. It comes with two silicone pads that are meant to make it snug with with the steering wheel, but they also make it hard to put the screw in correctly. It is adequate comfort-wise, but a bit small to hold in your hand if you're used to the larger, rounder knobs.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through quite a. number of turning knobs over the past year, none of which would stay in place, or be comfortable to use, Inevitably loosening either at the point at which it was fastened to the wheel or where the knob was fastened to the fastener. I am happy to report that this product is the best I've used. It is discrete, screws and solidly without any play and its knob turns freely and feels good to the touch. I am completely pleased with it. I don't often write good reviews but this was a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Ken G.

customer_reviews.title: Problem Solved
customer_reviews.text: Before shoulder surgery I read driving after makes it so much easier to turn wheel one handed. The screw it comes with is a bad design. It comes with a 8m pan head screw, which requires a Philips head screw driver that you have to work backwards. I went the Lowes and got a hex head bolt so you can tighten with a wrench from the front. Design could easily be changed. The I would rate it a 10. Plus I'm keeping mine on even though I no longer need it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W. Spain

customer_reviews.title: Gave me my independence back!! I bought 3!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this installed for 9 months now and with both spacers, which are included for a reason, it hasn't budged even a little bit. It's smooth but a good, silicone-feel grip and spins super easily. After a car accident left me with neck and dominant arm nerve damage, I hadn't driven for 3.5 years. This suicide knob and a panoramic rearview mirror and I'm mobile again!! Highly recommended if installed appropriately :) Update 7/19: Still using the first one with my backup always ready but not even remotely necessary at this point. I still highly recommend this knob!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi498

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Price is great.
customer_reviews.text: I had a shoulder injury. I needed this product to be able to drive until I had repair surgery. Because of my injury it was difficult to install. Recommend that a injury free person installs. Works well. Price is great.
customer_reviews.author: dale cook

customer_reviews.title: Easy and smooth turn. Rubberized knob feels good
customer_reviews.text: I just tossed away 8 ball which I bought from a truck stop and install this one. Much better quality and fit perfectly for my 2018 Cascadia. I gave four out of five stars because after one week the rubber coating starts peel off from outer turning knob. I know this is just cosmetic issue and unit still functions well as should be. My recommendation to manufacture is do not add rubber coat outer wheel area, just rubberized center circular area is sufficient enough. I’m still recommending to other truck drivers this unit is far better than 8 ball you bought from the truck stop.
customer_reviews.author: Hoon P.

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I got this cause I had a cast on my left hand and still needed to drive myself around. It took some time to get the knob to not move when turning, but it works. On that note it's big and I had to adjust my seat for when I have my work uniform on and the rubber coating is thin and peeled off within days. It's mediocre at best and my opinion is for anyone reading this look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Works, but rubberized coating starts coming off almost right away
customer_reviews.text: I like the low profile, the easy installation (sort of), and the rubberized handle. But the rubberized coating of the hard plastic knob started coming off within two weeks of using it. So now I have scraped the rest of it off and just use the hard plastic knob, which still works. For the product maker, I would recommend you texturize the plastic to feel like rubber rather than coat smooth plastic with a rubber coating that won't stay on. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: PME

customer_reviews.title: Bad product peeling.
customer_reviews.text: Recently received this. Put it on my golf cart. 1-if you are going to sell in U S put instructions in English. Came in Chinese,ridiculous. 2- the coating or covering at the rim of the knob is starting to peel off.Really bad mfg process. I'll be returning this and adding a review to our neighborhood Facebook page(some 4,000 golfers) .
customer_reviews.author: Spice

customer_reviews.title: English Instructions?
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure I will be able to figure out installation with the comments left on this site, but come on- if you are going to sell a product in the US, provide some English instructions. All in Korean or Chinese or something. At least leave a comment in the question and answer area as to where to get them or just type them out in that area. Looks pretty well made and will probably work well. Will comment more after I install. Would probably be 5 star if not for the lack of English
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging, quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great packaging, quality construction. Cons: Difficult to figure out sizing and to install. If you are not super careful you can strip the threads. My knob didn't have the correct threads and would not match up. Install process was very aggravating. Also, I angry that the retailer does not have a return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: assembled poorly.
customer_reviews.text: I liked product to start with. Then the internal screw that held the bearing in place came loose and in the processes of trying to take it apart I broke it. Needs lock tight on the bearing screw. Heads up to take apart remove the center rubber piece. Its held on with double sided tape. Easy to put back on. I'll probably buy it again and add lock tight to fit the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Okay!!
customer_reviews.text: The product didn’t fit on my steering wheel with the rubber piece that it came with had to make my own adjustments because it was scratching the steering wheel !! After finally putting it on It just started peeling off the red paint !I just took it off I don’t like the fact that it’s crash my steering wheel
customer_reviews.author: felix bk

customer_reviews.title: Makes turning easy as heck
customer_reviews.text: I had shoulder surgery on my dominant (right) shoulder, and was unable to use my arm for a few weeks. Well, the bus is neither convenient nor more affordable than driving so I decided to try this bad boy out and I LOVE it. It was a little strange at first but once I got used to it, turning and parallel parking became a breeze. SWEET FREEDOM!!!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the black rubber Grip surface...Non-Slip. My car has a leather-wrapped steering wheel, so the Thick rubber pad was too thick, and the Thin one, not thick enough (Gadzooks!). I went with the Thin one, and it seems tight enough. We'll see. But I only plan to make use of this at low speeds, like going in & out of driveways, etc. so Driving Safety should not be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price but cheaply made. Material already peeling off the knob. Only had it for a week or so. I don’t wear gloves when using the knob and steering wheel and my hand are always clean. Otherwise I would say greasy hands could cause it. I use it in my kenworth semi truck. Doesn’t like to hold on as well, have to adjust it every once and awhile. You use a Phillips screw driver to tight down, replaced it with a hex bolt and lock washer for better support. It’s good for the price like I said but cheaply made. Will probably only last until the end of winter.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R

customer_reviews.title: Buy this you two handed fool. Turn w/ one hand w/ ease.
customer_reviews.text: I have two hands but damn this makes one-handed turns....awesome! It took some time to install it just right but I got it to fit and I love it. On a Hot hot hot day, the nob doesn't get hot. My steering wheel gets hotter than the knob. Don't buy the C shape one, those are not secure and can pop out. This one takes longer to install but worth the security and peace of mind that it won't slip or pop out. Since June 2016, installed and it has not shifted or moved. Still spins and works like year 2...haha. Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Only have use of one arm very helpful item
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately lost use of my right arm from a workplace accident. I bought this so that since I’m only able to use my left arm now I’m not overusing my arm which is causing me horrific pain. I haven’t been able to drive my car as I’m not able to fully hold onto the steering wheel due to the left arm now suffering as well this is been a help so that I can still drive.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Makes driving fun again
customer_reviews.text: This steering wheel knob has made driving fun again now that I have relocated it to the upper right of my steering wheel. It's actually possible to steer using just the knob but I typically keep a second hand on the wheel. I used a right angle drill with a Phillips head bit to tighten the bolt so I have total confidence that the knob is safe and will not move while driving. It's made well and makes driving fun again.
customer_reviews.author: Dorkydavid

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, but spins around steering wheel
customer_reviews.text: I tried several ways to get this to stay put on the steering wheel on my John Deere tractor. I used one of the rubber spacers and then both. Nothing seems to work. If I had enough spacer, the two halves of the Bl Silicon Black Platinum Power Handle Car Steering Wheel Suicide Spinner Accessory Knob would not pair up. I like the feel of the knob, but unable to use on my tractor.
customer_reviews.author: rustnhere

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add to my golf cart to make steering a little easier. My only complaints so far are: -this wasn't the easiest to install; needing both rubber pads, would have been easier if they were both the same thickness. -the knob is almost too large; it would be easier to grip and use if it were slightly smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Redwood Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Helps me keep my independence
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased four of these now for every vehicle I have owned in the last five years. I will buy it every time I purchase a vehicle or when the old one wears out (none of them have). But the people buying my used cars always want me to leave them behind once they try them. I currently have a disability with my right arm and this makes it possible for me to drive my blazer with less than great power steering. Don’t think about it just buy one you will not regret it. This item allows me to continue living and independent life without relying on other people to drive me places.
customer_reviews.author: Deadon Leprechaun

customer_reviews.title: Solid Brody Knob
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2013 Subaru 5 speed and live in the city. I grew up driving with brody knobs and I finally got one for my car. I love it because it allows me to have full control over my car when making turns and to keep my hand on the stick shift because of the constant downshifting and upshifting in the city. Pros - Looks good, sturdy, and spins like a top. Cons- A little hard to install. It comes with rubber spacers to mitigate wheel size circumference. You just have to take your time and find the sweet spot for your car steering wheel and it fits snug and secure. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Beware. It may not fit.
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit in a car with a thicker steering wheel. Amazon says this is ineligible for return. This did not fit in my car and now it is a $20 piece of garbage. I’m not sure why this is “ineligible” for return because there is nothing in the return policy stating such at the time of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works better in some vehicles than others
customer_reviews.text: I first installed this in my 2011 Jeep Grand Cherokee Laredo. It was tight and didn't slip at all. Then I removed it and installed it in my 2018 JGC Limited. Can't get it to tighten and slips inward when you put too much pressure on it. It's not a huge problem and I'm a bit concerned about damaging the heating wires inside the steering wheel by trying to over tighten it. I just learned how not to push down on it and it stays in place most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spinner works like a champ on my utv
customer_reviews.text: I have installed 5-6 of these types of spinners. I put this on a new can am defender max Thursday night - easy to install. Friday I arrived at the ranch and the spinner was missing but the clamp was still on the steering wheel. I have never had this happen. I contacted amazon/seller for a replacement. No word yet. If I get another and it works I will up my score. I don't recommend installing this on a open vehicle that is being trailered. Update 10/17/19. The supplier replaced the spinner within two days. All seems to be working well. I appreciate the quick response in getting a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described and seems to be good quality. I've only been using it for a couple months on my pickup so not sure about long term durability. Honestly I can't believe I haven't had a spinner before. It makes turning and backing up a lot easier especially for a larger vehicle. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Simple but Effective
customer_reviews.text: Four stars because I had to make shims to enable a proper fit. But, other than the shim issue this is a simple item that works well. The spinner relieves the joint pain caused by the steer wheel turning motion. I've positioned the spinner so I'm able to control the vehicle with a minimum of effort. I've used these devices before, but since I was told they're illegal, I discontinued use. I'm glad I found this product, it makes driving a vehicle enjoyable again.
customer_reviews.author: M. B. Keith

customer_reviews.title: Streamline design.
customer_reviews.text: Originally had a standard knob that stuck striaght up, which bumped my wrist if I tried using the wheel normally. This unit is tucked in toward the center and is lower in profile, but still very usable. Allows the wheel to be used normally, or with the knob. I like the feel and like the look.
customer_reviews.author: John Boy

customer_reviews.title: Mint
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2016 super duty for plowing. No more raw hand from doing driveways or roadways all day/night. I’ve had this for three years now and have used it on a variety of trucks. Pretty much will mount onto any steering wheel. May need slight modification but I did not.
customer_reviews.author: Ford Trucks

customer_reviews.title: I'd give it five stars, but....
customer_reviews.text: We can't get it tight enough no to twist on my Subaru wheel. I had an operation on my left hand and used this for the right to drive. I'm going to try to shim it, but it's tough to get on and off so I'll wait a bit. :) Nice action, though!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Homegrown

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy, fits well, works well but installation instructions on Korean
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be well built and study. It works well and does not slide to the side. The only installation instructions were a good drawing but all the words were in Korean. Having them in English would have made installation quicker and smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Surface Cracking & Peeling
customer_reviews.text: And I bought this just to make it a little easier to turn my truck while I am drinking coffee on the way to work in the morning. The mechanics seem sturdy enough, but I have a real problem with the way the item is wearing after only a couple months of light use. As you can see from my picture, the matte black texture is peeling away along the edges and will eventually come off altogether. Needless to say I don’t like the way this makes my truck look.
customer_reviews.author: Backwoods Mister

customer_reviews.title: A huge help when parallel parking
customer_reviews.text: It's just your standard "suicide knob". Be careful not to use it while driving at high speeds before your used to how much you oversteer with it. These things are illegal in lots of states, unless you have a medical reason.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dutch

customer_reviews.title: All tried different brands but by far this is the best knob I got
customer_reviews.text: I had 4 similar steering wheel knobs so far. All tried different brands but by far this is the best knob I got. Met my high expectations. It fits my Tacoma's steering wheel perfectly. I like the silicon feel - rubbery and it grips. The design is perfect. Not round but like a flying saucer. My only gripe but it does not affect my 5 star rating is the manufacturer should have put a hinge to make it much easier to install. Other than than this is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool. Buying another one for my second car and convinced coworkers to get it with just a little look and touch.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the concept of this little thing. I wish there was more competition in the way of quality products out there. But it seems this one takes the cake for quality of all the offerings on Amazon. Very smooth bearing and soft to the touch but the soft rubbery coating will def wear off if struck while getting in and out of car. (my experience) Still Worth Every PENNY!
customer_reviews.author: heraldo

customer_reviews.title: It helps
customer_reviews.text: I use this handy little thing in my Geo Metro. Since the Metros do not have any power steering, this has become a very handy addition to my daily driving. The shape and the mobility of it are wonderful. However, the silicone has already started to flake away within two days use. Cosmetics are not my main concern, but it does take away some of the neat aspect it has. Regardless, I would purchase again and recommend to any fellow Geo Metro drivers.
customer_reviews.author: jlknoir

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I drive a forklift at work and they have a power handle from the factory. I put one on my car and truck. I don't use them all the time but if you need to make a sharp turn, back into a parking spot, parallel park, etc. they will pay for themselves immediately. None of my current vehicles have manual transmissions (unfortunately) but if you have a "stick shift" you need one of these. (The reason they put them on forklifts is that you only have one hand for the steering wheel because your other hand is running all of the fork control levers.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have difficulty in backing up your car.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I had both rotator cuffs repaired and it was very difficult to back-up my car when going to Physical Therapy. I remembered my Granpa had a Suicide Knob back in the olden days. So I found this. Works great!! Not sure I will take it off even after I am all healed with my shoulders. Unless a State Trooper sees it on my steering wheel. :)
customer_reviews.author: dancer25

customer_reviews.title: Works well on 2015 Jeep Renegade..
customer_reviews.text: Had to use some of the included rubber pads, but did the job. Ended up mounting it at the bottom right of my wheel and it has made driving (and fiddling with it) a much more pleasurable experience. The nice coating is starting to come off the edges from every day use/hand grime/friction, but still working great.
customer_reviews.author: William B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Really great knob!!! It is super comfy for my hand and turns the wheel really smooth! It was a little hard to install being that I didn’t have to much room to screw it in but install only took 5-10 minutes. Super happy!
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Theiss

customer_reviews.title: How to make your recreational life even easier!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and mounted them on the steering wheels of my golf cart and '79 Sea Ray 192 bow rider. Now, I can steer the cart with one hand as I hold onto whatever is sitting by my side. As for the boat, I replaced the OEM throttle and steering systems after 36 years Of great service, and immediately found I had a steering wheel-hand-throttle clearance problem. By installing the knob inside the steering wheel's arc, I am now able to steer the boat with my left hand constantly on the knob while my right hand remains on the throttle, thereby avoiding the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Prop*Wash

customer_reviews.title: Would not be without it
customer_reviews.text: Broke my wrist & I could not have driven without this. It makes driving & parking so easy I am still using it 18months later. I will be getting another one for when I drive my grandkids in their car. Easy to take on & off.
customer_reviews.author: BlueSkys

customer_reviews.title: Really smooth
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same one 2 1/2 years ago for my Nissan Titan truck and I do a lot of driving in the city. I finally wore it out and bought it again just now. Just super soft on your hand and easy to turn. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Willee

customer_reviews.title: I Don't Read Korean
customer_reviews.text: This is a well constructed item. Had the instructions been in German, French or Italian I could have made sense of them, but I just don't read a word of Korean. Is it acceptable to Amazon that not a single word of the instructions for the assembly, fitting or use of the unit was in English?? That's why it only gets 3 out of 5
customer_reviews.author: SEAN O'CONNOR

customer_reviews.title: ... well and fits my 2005 VW steering wheel just fine. Had to get a different bolt to use
customer_reviews.text: Works well and fits my 2005 VW steering wheel just fine. Had to get a different bolt to use, as where I placed the knob, I couldn't get a phillips screwdriver (even a stubby) between the back of the knob and the steering column. Size that fit was M8-1.25 x 16
customer_reviews.author: D. Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Fit. NOT RETURNABLE!
customer_reviews.text: My 2019 Honda Accord's steering wheel is too thick to mount this knob. Tried to return it. Found out that this item is not returnable, even though this is not indicated on the product webpage. BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: cagey

customer_reviews.title: Easy Grip, Durable, Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Wide rolled makes for easy maneuvering especially for larger hands. Have had for almost a year and rubber is holding up well. Only down side is it could be a little taller as to know get you hand caught if you mount it anyway on a spoke of the steering wheel. Have one mounted on all my vehicles and absolutely love them, ecspecailly for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: NOt for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and didnt feel comfortable using it, as there is no return policy and i am stuck with it, its lying in some corner.
customer_reviews.author: Anki

customer_reviews.title: Needed to go to Home Depot to buy my own ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed to go to Home Depot to buy my own bolt bc the one provided was barely long enough and ended up stripping a little of the threads in the hole. I have a Honda Accord so no oversized steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: James Chavez

customer_reviews.title: The one I put in my semi is great specially when I'm backing up
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 on for my pick up truck and another for my semi. The one I put on my pick up works as advertised but so far I'm not sure it's practical but haven't driven much since getting it. The one I put in my semi is great specially when I'm backing up. Update: Since writing this review and putting the spinner on my steering wheel the finish on the handle has some wear on it. I'll contact seller and see if I can get a replacement because I was really enjoying using this on my truck. Still works amazing but will have to downgrade stars until I contact seller
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This one feels great in the hand. Easy to install and feels sturdy, they made a quality product. Thelast two I ordered from another company and they were uncomfortable hard to install and they fell apart. THIS IS THE ONE YOU WANT
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Great handle. It works better on smooth surfaces. My wheel has some "finger holders" and they slip just a little bit after a long use. But the grip is awesome, and the turning is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon SDA

customer_reviews.title: Nice fidget spinner
customer_reviews.text: Nice fidget spinner. Works well. I tried a few U-turns with this and it works well. The only thing is that it pinches my thumb if it gets in the way. So I have to get used to this and avoid it. Perhaps the knob could be a little higher. Comes with one big strong screw.
customer_reviews.author: S. L.

customer_reviews.title: Allows fast one handed turning
customer_reviews.text: It's like adding some power steering since it effectively makes the steering wheel diameter bigger. It's kind of awkward to install and had to play with whether it needed 1 or both of the rubber spacers. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: pbb

customer_reviews.title: Nice Handle, pay attention to size though
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to the size and placement of this handle. This handle is a fairly large one. I couldn't use it on my 2003 Pontiac Vibe GT. Didn't fit on the inside of the wheel and the outside. On the outside it would have hit my legs, when I went in a circle. The quality is excellent, but I couldn't use it on my vehicle. The four stars are for the product only.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowdancer2018

customer_reviews.text: It fit my 2016 Wrangler Unlimited Steering Wheel perfect ... if your looking for some "real world" measurements, 4,1/8" - 4,1/4" (measured as pictured). Heavy build, solid feel, spins nice (though probably not ball bearings). Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: MePaul

customer_reviews.title: Great suicide knob!
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice! The inserts make installation very easy! I have on in my semi and now in my f150. Great product, good material. Exactly as described. Update 4/5/2019: product began peeling on the side revealing the clear coat black. Not the end of the world. Also you will need loctite for the screw or else you will be tightning it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: if you have had shoulder rotator cuff surgery, this suicide knob will greatly assist you.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Quality spinner but...
customer_reviews.text: Good steering wheel spinner but, I think it hangs too close to the center of the steering wheel and I am afraid it might interfere with the airbag. I could mount it the other way but then I'd be hitting my legs with every turn (I have long legs and not much leg room in my delivery vehicle)
customer_reviews.author: MLW

customer_reviews.title: and sturdy. Turns nicely
customer_reviews.text: Very solid, and sturdy. Turns nicely, with minimal friction. Two problems; its a pain to get on(but that's negatable, given that once its on, you most likely won't need to move it.), and that the thin rubberized coating on the sides of the knob started to wear off within a month or two, but it still works the same.
customer_reviews.author: David Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but the black material comes off onto ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but the black material comes off onto the seat of my JD tractor if I tilt the seat up to keep rain off it when not in use. You just have to make sure the knob is positioned where it done not contact the seat. I do not see an black material on my hands though.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Gottschalk

customer_reviews.title: Rubber comes off
customer_reviews.text: They are nice but hard to install and don’t clamp securely on some stearin wheels. Also the silicone rubber comes off in a few weeks - they really need a better quality product
customer_reviews.author: AZ dude

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 of them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of this for my car and the truck. Nice and practical looks good. Especially if you are a semi truck driver it's a really good practical tool makes your backing as twice as easy, faster and accurate. And it makes my driving a lot saver too. But some states think that is not safe and has stuped regulations. I got a violatin for using it in Washington State. It is crazy. For some stupid reason government thinks it is not safe. They are nonsensing. This knob has really thin rubber covering around it and it peels off easely, but don't worry after about 10 months it's completely peels off you won't even notice it afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: ravshan

customer_reviews.title: makes steering a stick shift a lot easier
customer_reviews.text: I've been driving a stick shift for years because I wanted the extra mileage of not having an automatic transmission. At the same time it's very difficult to control a vehicle and shift gears at the same time when you're turning a corner especially. This has really made a difference in the ease of steering my stick shift Honda
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Molczyk

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on 2010 Toyota camry steering wheel. My had shoulder surgery and she is able to drive with confidence to her PT appointment at 3 weeks post op. (Disclaimer: Please refer to your doctor for medical advice this is just speaking from her experience) Follow the instructions and tighten it down it wont budge
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Neal

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Fits, but gets sloppy after many uses. Still works as intended, but doesn't stay static as most people would desire. Also, if not carefully installed it can scratch the steering wheel. Install with caution and check regularly if that matters to you.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Beaton

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: I have it in my semi and the Silicone coating rubbed off within 1st week no big deal other than that it's fine. Low profile and don't get in way. I tried it in several different places on wheel and for truckers I recommend putting it dead center 6 o'clock on bottom of wheel not up top.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I hate driving without one. Really helps days I have pain flares. And I like this one better than my previous cheaper version. It feels sturdier and better in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Crystaphaze

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!  Used on CitE Car electric bus.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Handles well, so fun. The steering wheel is a little thin but it still grips and really helps when backing through tight spaces. Manual steering though, and the fit is not tight enough to really crank the wheel around, but still an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Comesitbymyfire

product_meta.title: Bl Silicon Black Platinum Power Handle Car Steering Wheel Suicide Spinner Accessory Knob for Car Vehicle
product_meta.description:
1. We focus on the automotive accessories market, providing top quality products with stylish and elegant design.
2. When turning the car, it lightens the turning radius and helps beginners and lady drivers to drive safely and conveniently. 
3. Enables driver to steer more precisely when driving slowly ofr parking.
4. Stylish and elegant design upgrades the fashion of the car. 
Dynamic and sporty design for more Safe Power Steering! Support the operation of steering wheel conveniently and smoothly Excellent grip, Ergonomics easy to install / suitable for most cars
feature_bullets: Product name : BL-G Silicon Power Handle
Easy to install and fits most standard wheels

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,382 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
